content.title:
haampie /

      libtree---ldd as a tree with an option to bundle dependencies into a single folder

danielmiessler /

      SecLists---SecLists is the security tester's companion. It's a collection of multiple types of lists used during security assessments, collected in one place. List types include usernames, passwords, URLs, sensitive data patterns, fuzzing payloads, web shells, and many more.

appsmithorg /

      appsmith---Low code project build any custom business software like admin panels, internal tools, and dashboards. Use 35+ pre-built UI widgets that connect to any database, GraphQL or REST API. Write all logic in Javascript.

FerretDB /

      FerretDB---A truly Open Source MongoDB alternative

Bogdanp /

      awesome-advent-of-code---A collection of awesome resources related to the yearly Advent of Code challenge.

github /

      docs---The open-source repo for docs.github.com

iron-fish /

      ironfish---A novel cryptocurrency focused on privacy and accessibility.

prabhatsharma /

      zinc---Zinc Search engine. A lightweight alternative to elasticsearch that requires minimal resources, written in Go.

Pycord-Development /

      pycord---Pycord, a maintained fork of discord.py, is a python wrapper for the Discord API

Qovery /

      engine---Deploy your apps on any Cloud provider in just a few seconds

facebookresearch /

      Mask2Former---Code release for "Masked-attention Mask Transformer for Universal Image Segmentation"

public-apis /

      public-apis---A collective list of free APIs

metaplex-foundation /

      metaplex---Protocol and application framework for decentralized NFT minting, storefronts, and sales.

open-mmlab /

      mmtracking---OpenMMLab Video Perception Toolbox. It supports Video Object Detection (VID), Multiple Object Tracking (MOT), Single Object Tracking (SOT), Video Instance Segmentation (VIS) with a unified framework.

      android-developer-roadmap---ğŸ—º Android Developer Roadmap 2022 suggests learning paths to understanding Android development.

      every-programmer-should-know---A collection of (mostly) technical things every software developer should know about

microsoft /

      dotnet-podcasts---.NET 6 reference application shown at .NET Conf 2021 featuring ASP.NET Core, Blazor, .NET MAUI, Microservices, and more!

o3de /

      o3de---Open 3D Engine (O3DE) is an Apache 2.0-licensed multi-platform 3D engine that enables developers and content creators to build AAA games, cinema-quality 3D worlds, and high-fidelity simulations without any fees or commercial obligations.

termux /

      termux-packages---A build system and primary set of packages for Termux.

shervinea /

      mit-15-003-data-science-tools---Study guides for MIT's 15.003 Data Science Tools

microsoft /

      PowerToys---Windows system utilities to maximize productivity
